planetarium.title: Application for the Strasbourg Planetarium
planetarium.subtitle: University of Strasbourg
planetarium.desc1: The user scrolls down the application and explores the different scales of the universe. This project offers visitors a new approach before visiting the Strasbourg planetarium. Its ambition is to offer a narrative, in the image of the planetarium, and a journey through the universe.
planetarium.desc2: The project's main challenge was to offer a narrative application that was fun and accessible to all. It was therefore necessary to offer a tutorial at launch.
planetarium.footer: Website designed in HTML/CSS and JavaScript

numistral.title: Redesign Numistral
numistral.subtitle: University of Strasbourg
numistral.desc1: This project is a redesign of the Numistral website, with the aim of improving navigation and archive searching. The first step was to examine the strengths and weaknesses of the original site.
numistral.desc2: It has been designed to maintain a uniform user interface. As the aim of the site is to bring together all the archive resources of different organizations, it is important to establish a standard for each archive and an index.
numistral.desc3: Overhauling the archive sorting and retrieval tool was a key stage in this project.
numistral.footer: Website designed in HTML/CSS and JavaScript
